name: The Tale of Gray
description:
The Tale of Gray is a platformer about existentialism and defining your own purpose whether it matters or not.

It's extremely difficult and requires both patience and skill to master. Your heart will race every time you defeat a new boss for the first time. 

Completely original SNES-style OST made using famitracker!

Devlog updated pretty often ig I work on this game a lot

ye. play my game.
